title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 88.1 - Sport fishing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 88.1 - Sport fishing

State Regulations

Sport fishing from the shore of Oyster Bay Mill Pond and
access thereto by walking is permitted during daylight hours. The refuge is
delineated on a map available at the Target Rock National Wildlife Refuge

Headquarters, Target Rock Road, Lloyd Neck, Huntington, NY 11743. Sport fishing
shall be in accordance with all applicable State regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
88.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
